short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to enrich GitLab Pipeline form

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enrich GitLab's Pipeline forms with common input controls - dropdowns, checkboxes, datepickers.
To convert an input to desired type, simply use on of supported input types in variable description in .gitlab-ci.yml file - e.g. @@list[], @@bool, @@date
